text: Ūriyāh ne jawāb diyā, “Ahd kā sandūq aur Isrāīl aur Yahūdāh ke faujī jhoṅpṛiyoṅ meṅ rah rahe haiṅ. Yoāb aur bādshāh ke afsar bhī khule maidān meṅ ṭhahre hue haiṅ to kyā munāsib hai ki maiṅ apne ghar jā kar ārām se khāūṅ-piyūṅ aur apnī bīwī se hambistar ho jāūṅ? Hargiz nahīṅ! Āp kī hayāt kī qasam, maiṅ kabhī aisā nahīṅ karūṅga.”
